Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Jean-Romain Roussel. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

  • Martin Isenburg. Copyright holder.
    Is the author of the included LASlib and LASzip libraries

  • Benoît St-Onge. Copyright holder.
    Is the author of the included 'chm_prep' function

  • Niels Lohmann. Copyright holder.
    Is the author of the included json parser

  • Volodymyr Bilonenko. Copyright holder.
    Is the author of the included delaunator triangulation

  • State Key Laboratory of Remote Sensing Science, Institute of Remote Sensing Science and Engineering, Beijing Normal University. Copyright holder.
    Is the copyright holder of the included CSF

  • Authors of Eigen. Copyright holder.
    Authorship and copyright in included Eigen library as detailed in inst/COPYRIGHTS

  • Marius Muja. Copyright holder.
    Is an author of the included nanoflann library

  • David G. Lowe. Copyright holder.
    Is an author of the included nanoflann library

  • Jose L. Blanco. Copyright holder.
    Is an author of the included nanoflann library

Citation

Source: DESCRIPTION

Roussel J (2025). lasR: Fast and Pipeable Airborne LiDAR Data Tools. R package version 0.16.2, https://github.com/r-lidar/lasR. 

@Manual{,
  title = {lasR: Fast and Pipeable Airborne LiDAR Data Tools},
